name: Spectral Blade
description: Only visible to ghosts. Deals 0 damage to the living.

name: Shadow Cloak
description: Perfect for blending in. Not so great for hiding in sunlight.

name: Potion of Regret
description: Drink to instantly recall every embarrassing moment in your life.

name: Enchanted Compass
description: Points to the nearest bad decision.

name: Golden Frying Pan
description: Doubles as a weapon and a skillet. Beware hot surfaces.
